short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension works on the IMDB site. Enriches the site with IMDB, Rotten Tomatoes and Metacritic ratings.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension works on the IMDB desktop site. It compiles movie ratings from various sites and displays them beside every instance of the movie name on the imdb site. Currently supports IMDB ratings, Rotten Tomato ratings and Metacritic ratings.
